page.title: 20THE SCHOOL DAY
page.content: We usually do most of our work in the mornings.Some things we have after lunch are Art, Project, Singing, Geography, or Needlework. When we have P.E, we have to move the furniture so we can have room for running. If it is nice we go outside and play rounders. We have specialist teachers who come to the school and they give us Music, Art and Needlework. The local Minister visits the school and we sing hymns and hear stories. We enjoy all of these things. My favourite is Needlework. Six children get a lift to school in a taxi as they live more than two miles away. When we leave Kirkton School at the end of Primary 7, we go to Charleston Academy in Inverness. It is about 4km away and a bus takes us there and back.
